[DQC.US.0005.49] The date of 2020-03-31 used for Increase in Financing Receivable Allowance For Credit Loss Percentage and the Scenario [Axis] and srt:ScenarioForecastMember with a value of 72 is earlier than or the same as the reporting period end date of 2020-03-31. Either remove the statement scenario axis and forecast member from this value, change the end date for the value or update the Document and Entity Information document period end date.
The properties of this pebo:IncreaseInFinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLossPercentage fact are: Period: 2020-03-31 Dimensions: srt:StatementScenarioAxis=srt:ScenarioForecastMember Unit: pure Rule version: 13.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/318300/000031830020000188/pebo-20200331.htm 4
